    Create a new Transaction and add it into the database file after validating the attributes If attributes are invalid, do nothing If database file exists, read existing records, append a new Transaction object, and save the file If database file does not exist, write Transaction object to a new file and save

  • Method Details

    • createTransaction

      public void createTransaction(String name, String email, String cinemaID, Model.Movie movie, String mobileNumber)
      Create a new Transaction and add it into the database file after validating the attributes If attributes are invalid, do nothing If database file exists, read existing records, append a new Transaction object, and save the file If database file does not exist, write Transaction object to a new file and save
      Parameters:
      name - Name of user of the transaction
      email - Email of user of the transaction
      cinemaID - Cinema of this Transaction
      movie - Movie of this Transaction
      mobileNumber - Mobile number of user in this Transaction

    • readTransactionByID

      public ArrayList<Model.Transaction> readTransactionByID(String TransactionID)
      Read and return every Transaction of given Transaction ID in the Database file
      Parameters:
      TransactionID - Transaction ID of Transaction to find
      Returns:
      Model.@Transaction Return list of Transaction if found, else empty list

    • readTransactionByEmail

      public ArrayList<Model.Transaction> readTransactionByEmail(String email)
      Read and return every Transaction of given email in the Database file
      Parameters:
      email - Email of user to find
      Returns:
      Model.Transaction Return list of Transaction if found, else empty list

    • readAllTransaction

      public ArrayList<Model.Transaction> readAllTransaction()
      Read and return every Cineplex in the Database file If Database file not found, return empty list
      Returns:
      Model.Transaction Return list of Transaction if found, else empty list

    • delete

      public void delete(String username, String TransactionID)
      Delete a Transaction in the Database file, using the Transaction ID and Username

      TransactionID -

    • replaceFile

      public void replaceFile(String filename, ArrayList<Model.Transaction> newTransactionList)
      Overwrite Database file with new data of list of Admin
      Parameters:
      filename - Filename to check
      newTransactionList - New ArrayList of Transaction to write to the file
